verses.text: The \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*. Behold, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w rideth|strong="H7392"\w* upon a \w swift|strong="H7031"\w* \w cloud|strong="H5645"\w*, and shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: and the \w idols|strong="H0457"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* shall be \w moved|strong="H5128"\w* at his \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*, and the \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* shall \w melt|strong="H4549"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of it.

And I will \w set|strong="H5526"\w* the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* against the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*: and they shall \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* against his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, and every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* against his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*; \w city|strong="H5892"\w* against \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \add and\add* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* against \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*.\f + \fr 19.2 \ft set: Heb. mingle\f*

And the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* shall \w fail|strong="H1238"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* thereof; and I will \w destroy|strong="H1104"\w* the \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* thereof: and they shall \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* to the \w idols|strong="H0457"\w*, and to the \w charmers|strong="H0328"\w*, and to them that have familiar \w spirits|strong="H0178"\w*, and to the \w wizards|strong="H3049"\w*.\f + \fr 19.3 \ft fail: Heb. be emptied\f*\f + \fr 19.3 \ft destroy: Heb. swallow up\f*

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* will I give \w over|strong="H5534"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of a \w cruel|strong="H7186"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*; and a \w fierce|strong="H5794"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* shall \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* over them, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.\f + \fr 19.4 \ft give…: or, shut up\f*

And the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* shall \w fail|strong="H5405"\w* from the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* shall be \w wasted|strong="H2717"\w* and dried \w up|strong="H3001"\w*.

And they shall \w turn|strong="H2186"\w* the \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* far \w away|strong="H2186"\w*; \add and\add* the \w brooks|strong="H2975"\w* of \w defence|strong="H4693"\w* shall be \w emptied|strong="H1809"\w* and dried \w up|strong="H2717"\w*: the \w reeds|strong="H7070"\w* and \w flags|strong="H5488"\w* shall \w wither|strong="H7060"\w*.

The paper \w reeds|strong="H6169"\w* by the \w brooks|strong="H2975"\w*, by the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w brooks|strong="H2975"\w*, and every thing \w sown|strong="H4218"\w* by the \w brooks|strong="H2975"\w*, shall \w wither|strong="H3001"\w*, be driven \w away|strong="H5086"\w*, and be no \add more\add*.\f + \fr 19.7 \ft and be…: Heb. and shall not be\f*

The \w fishers|strong="H1771"\w* also shall \w mourn|strong="H0578"\w*, and all they that \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w angle|strong="H2443"\w* into the \w brooks|strong="H2975"\w* shall \w lament|strong="H0056"\w*, and they that \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* \w nets|strong="H4365"\w* \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* shall \w languish|strong="H0535"\w*.

Moreover they that \w work|strong="H5647"\w* in \w fine|strong="H8305"\w* \w flax|strong="H6593"\w*, and they that \w weave|strong="H0707"\w* \w networks|strong="H2355"\w*, shall be \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w*.\f + \fr 19.9 \ft networks: or, white works\f*

And they shall be \w broken|strong="H1792"\w* in the \w purposes|strong="H8356"\w* thereof, all that \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w sluices|strong="H7938"\w* \add and\add* \w ponds|strong="H0099"\w* for \w fish|strong="H5315"\w*.\f + \fr 19.10 \ft purposes: Heb. foundations\f*\f + \fr 19.10 \ft for fish: Heb. of living things\f*

¶ Surely the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Zoan|strong="H6814"\w* \add are\add* \w fools|strong="H0191"\w*, the \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* of the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w counsellors|strong="H3289"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* is become \w brutish|strong="H1197"\w*: how \w say|strong="H0559"\w* ye unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, I \add am\add* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w ancient|strong="H6924"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*?

\w Where|strong="H0335"\w* \add are\add* they? \w where|strong="H0645"\w* \add are\add* thy \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \add men\add*? and let them \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* thee now, and let them \w know|strong="H3045"\w* what the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* hath \w purposed|strong="H3289"\w* upon \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

The \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Zoan|strong="H6814"\w* are become \w fools|strong="H2973"\w*, the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Noph|strong="H5297"\w* are \w deceived|strong="H5377"\w*; they have also \w seduced|strong="H8582"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \add even they that are\add* the \w stay|strong="H6438"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 19.13 \ft they that…: or, governors: Heb. corners\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w mingled|strong="H4537"\w* a \w perverse|strong="H5773"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* thereof: and they have caused \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* to \w err|strong="H8582"\w* in every \w work|strong="H4639"\w* thereof, as a \w drunken|strong="H7910"\w* \add man\add* \w staggereth|strong="H8582"\w* in his \w vomit|strong="H6892"\w*.\f + \fr 19.14 \ft a perverse…: Heb. a spirit of perversities\f*

Neither shall there be \add any\add* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* for \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, which the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* or \w tail|strong="H2180"\w*, \w branch|strong="H3712"\w* or \w rush|strong="H0100"\w*, may \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* be like unto \w women|strong="H0802"\w*: and it shall be \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w* and \w fear|strong="H6342"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w shaking|strong="H8573"\w* of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, which he \w shaketh|strong="H5130"\w* over it.

And the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* shall be a \w terror|strong="H2283"\w* unto \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, every one that maketh \w mention|strong="H2142"\w* thereof shall be \w afraid|strong="H6342"\w* in himself, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, which he hath \w determined|strong="H3289"\w* against it.

¶ In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* the \w language|strong="H8193"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, and \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; \w one|strong="H0259"\w* shall be \w called|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w destruction|strong="H2041"\w*.\f + \fr 19.18 \ft the language: Heb. the lip\f*\f + \fr 19.18 \ft of destruction: or, of Heres, or, of the sun\f*

In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall there be an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and a \w pillar|strong="H4676"\w* \w at|strong="H0681"\w* the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* thereof to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And it shall be for a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* and for a \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: for they shall \w cry|strong="H6817"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w oppressors|strong="H3905"\w*, and he shall \w send|strong="H7971"\w* them a \w saviour|strong="H3467"\w*, and a great \w one|strong="H7227"\w*, and he shall \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* them.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall be \w known|strong="H3045"\w* to \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and shall \w do|strong="H5647"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* and \w oblation|strong="H4503"\w*; yea, they shall \w vow|strong="H5087"\w* a \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w perform|strong="H7999"\w* \add it\add*.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w smite|strong="H5062"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: he shall \w smite|strong="H5062"\w* and \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* \add it:\add* and they shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \add even\add* to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and he shall be \w intreated|strong="H6279"\w* of them, and shall \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* them.

¶ In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall there be a \w highway|strong="H4546"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* to \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, and the \w Assyrian|strong="H0804"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and the \w Egyptian|strong="H4714"\w* into \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, and the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* with the \w Assyrians|strong="H0804"\w*.

In that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* be the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* with \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* and with \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*, \add even\add* a \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*:

Whom the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* shall \w bless|strong="H1288"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of my \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* mine \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.
